synopsis:
Announced at the Soushi Minashiro Birthday Fes 2021. Initially promised to fans during the 2017 birthday event, this self-contained entry to the Fafner series will be a "peaceful spinoff".

(Source: ANN, edited)

title.en: Fafner of the Blue Sky: Behind the Line
title.jp: Soukyuu no Fafner: Behind the Line
